battles.intro: Welcome to your first battle. Prepare to meet your opponent: Sokka!
enemy text: My first girlfriend turned into the moon. But I'm gonna turn you into dead meat!
Yeah, whatever. Get ready to lose, loser.
I'll get you next time.
Hah! Dead meat! I told you.
player text: Sorry about your girlfriend, dude. That really sucks.
battles.outro_win: Congratulations, you defeated Sokka! You may proceed to the next battle.
battles.outro_lose: Sokka wins! Try again next time.

battles.intro: Welcome to your third battle. Prepare to meet your opponent: Toph!
enemy text: The best part about being blind is I don't have to see your ugly face. Bleh.
Yeah, yeah. Why don't you cry about it. But wait til after I beat you.
You were just lucky. My feet were kinda sensitive today.
Hah, I won! You can cry now, ugly.
player text: Wait, how do you even know if I'm ugly when you're blind?
battles.outro_win: Congratulations, you defeated Toph! You may proceed to the next battle.
battles.outro_lose: Toph wins! Better luck next time.

huhghgh grumph
humph grhhhrrr
umph ghhghrerrr
player text: Aww, Appa, I could never fight you!
You're too cute; sorry in advance!
battles.outro_win: Congratulations, you defeated Appa! You may proceed to the next battle.
battles.outro_lose: Appa wins! Don't underestimate this giant fluff next time.

battles.intro: Welcome to your fifth battle. Prepare to meet your opponent: Suki!
enemy text: Think you can win against a Kyoshi warrior?
You wish you had the power of a woman. Get ready to be humiliated.
Ugh, I lost on purpose to make you feel better about your masculinity.
That one was for the girls!
player text: I'm not sure about this--I mean, you're just a girl.
I'll go easy on you, Suki.
battles.outro_win: Congratulations, you defeated Suki! You may proceed to the next battle.
battles.outro_lose: Suki wins! Maybe next time you'll win if you put on a dress.

battles.intro: Welcome to your sixth battle. Prepare to meet your opponent: Katara!
enemy text: Hi, Aang. As much as I lo- care about you, I think we both know who's gonna win this.
Ugh, let's just get this over with.
I just didn't want to hurt you.
Sorry, Aang. You're not too hurt, though, are you?
player text: Wait, what did you say? Lo-
battles.outro_win: Congratulations, you defeated Katara! You may proceed to the next battle.
battles.outro_lose: Katara wins! She didn't really want to, though.

battles.intro: Welcome to your seventh battle. Prepare to meet your opponent: Zuko!
enemy text: I might be bad at being good, but I'm pretty darn good at being bad. Get ready to lose, Avatar.
Don't worry about it. Let's fight.
Whatever. I just didn't want you to doubt my loyalty.
I'm never happy, but watching you lose just made my day.
player text: Your scar is on the wrong side, coward.
Uhh, Zuko? Are you sure you're Team Avatar?
battles.outro_win: Congratulations, you defeated Zuko! You have completed the episode!
battles.outro_lose: Zuko wins! Can't believe you lost to a emotionally unstable teenage boy who has a constant interal struggle with his moral compass.
